record.properties: Top = 220 Left = 1 Width = 765 Height = 493 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Top = 20 Left = 10 Height = 354 Width = 90 Alias = "mr_files" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_files" Name = "Cursor1"
Top = 20 Left = 150 Height = 90 Width = 90 Alias = "mr_modids" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_modids" Name = "Cursor2"
Top = 0 Left = 0 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "COMPARE CONFIG" uniqueid = CD1B8D66C8634067ABD58B2D71493C6B Name = "MR_COMPARECONFIG" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE init2 Thisform.txtfolder1.Value = _inigetvalue('COMPARECONFIG_FOLDER1', '') Thisform.txtfolder2.Value = _inigetvalue('COMPARECONFIG_FOLDER2', '')
Thisform.updateui() ENDPROC PROCEDURE load2 Select * From 'mr_comparelog' Where 1 = 0 Into Cursor 'sql_log1' Readwrite
Use Dbf('sql_log1') Again In 0 Alias 'sql_log'
Select 'sql_log'
index on sql_log.filename1 tag 'filename1'
index on sql_log.guid tag 'guid'
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_compare local file1, file2, params, winmerge
do case
case sql_log.hash1 = 0
mr_shellexecute('"' + addbs(thisform.txtfolder2.value) + sql_log.filename2 + '"')
case sql_log.hash2 = 0
mr_shellexecute('"' + addbs(thisform.txtfolder1.value) + sql_log.filename1 + '"')
case sql_log.hash1 = sql_log.hash2
mr_shellexecute('"' + addbs(thisform.txtfolder2.value) + sql_log.filename2 + '"')
otherwise
m.file1 = '"' + addbs(thisform.txtfolder1.value) + sql_log.filename1 + '"'
m.file2 = '"' + addbs(thisform.txtfolder2.value) + sql_log.filename2 + '"'
m.params = ' /e /s /u ' + m.file1 + space(1) + m.file2
m.winmerge = _inigetvalue('WINMERGE_EXE_PATH', 'C:\Program Files\WinMerge\WinMergeU.exe')
mr_createprocess(m.winmerge, m.params)
endcase
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_genlist *!* mr_genlist
Local eol, modurl, txt
m.eol = 0h20200d0a
select sql_log
m.txt = '**New**' + 0h0d0a
scan for sql_log.levent == 'NEW'
*m.txt = m.txt + '- **' + sql_log.modname + '** (' + sql_log.filename2 + ')' + 0h0d0a
=seek(sql_log.hash2, 'mr_files', 'hash')
m.modurl = mr_geturlproject(mr_files.aid)
if empty(m.modurl)
=seek(sql_log.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid')
m.modurl = mr_modids.url
endif
if empty(m.modurl)
m.txt = m.txt + '- ' + sql_log.modname + ': ' + sql_log.filename2 + m.eol
else
m.txt = m.txt + '- [' + sql_log.modname + ':](' + m.modurl + ')' + ' ' + sql_log.filename2 + m.eol
endif
endscan
m.txt = m.txt + m.eol
m.txt = m.txt + '**Removed**' + m.eol
scan for 'REMOVED' $ sql_log.levent
=seek(sql_log.hash2, 'mr_files', 'hash')
m.modurl = mr_geturlproject(mr_files.aid)
if empty(m.modurl)
=seek(sql_log.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid')
m.modurl = mr_modids.url
endif
if empty(m.modurl)
m.txt = m.txt + '- ' + sql_log.modname + ': ' + sql_log.filename2 + m.eol
else
m.txt = m.txt + '- [' + sql_log.modname + ':](' + m.modurl + ')' + ' ' + sql_log.filename2 + m.eol
endif
*m.txt = m.txt + '- ' + sql_log.modname + ' (' + sql_log.filename2 + ')' + m.eol
endscan
m.txt = m.txt + m.eol
m.txt = m.txt + '**Updated**' + m.eol
scan for 'UPDATED' $ sql_log.levent
=seek(sql_log.hash2, 'mr_files', 'hash')
m.modurl = mr_geturlproject(mr_files.aid)
if empty(m.modurl)
=seek(sql_log.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid')
m.modurl = mr_modids.url
endif
if empty(m.modurl)
m.txt = m.txt + '- ' + sql_log.modname + ': ' + sql_log.filename2 + m.eol
else
m.txt = m.txt + '- [' + sql_log.modname + ':](' + m.modurl + ')' + ' (' + sql_log.filename1 + ' -> ' + sql_log.filename2 + ')' + m.eol
endif
*m.txt = m.txt + '- ' + sql_log.modname + ' (' + sql_log.filename1 + ' -> ' + sql_log.filename2 + ')' + m.eol
endscan
m.txt = m.txt + m.eol
m.txt = m.txt + '**Enabled/Disabled**' + m.eol
scan for 'ENABLED' $ sql_log.levent or 'DISABLED' $ sql_log.levent
=seek(sql_log.hash2, 'mr_files', 'hash')
m.modurl = mr_geturlproject(mr_files.aid)
if empty(m.modurl)
=seek(sql_log.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid')
m.modurl = mr_modids.url
endif
if empty(m.modurl)
m.txt = m.txt + '- ' + sql_log.modname + ': ' + sql_log.filename2 + m.eol
else
m.txt = m.txt + '- [' + sql_log.modname + ':](' + m.modurl + ')' + ' (' + sql_log.filename1 + ' -> ' + sql_log.filename2 + ')' + m.eol
endif
*m.txt = m.txt + '- ' + sql_log.modname + ' (' + sql_log.filename1 + ' -> ' + sql_log.filename2 + ')' + m.eol
endscan
m.txt = m.txt + m.eol
m.txt = m.txt + '**NO CHANGES**' + m.eol
scan for empty(sql_log.levent)
m.txt = m.txt + '- ' + sql_log.modname + ' (' + sql_log.filename1 + ' -> ' + sql_log.filename2 + ')' + m.eol
endscan
_cliptext = m.txt
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_scan *!* mr_scan
local filename, folder1, folder2
_logwrite('PROCESS START')
delete all in 'sql_log'
m.folder1 = rtrim(alltrim(thisform.txtfolder1.value), 1, '\')
m.folder2 = rtrim(alltrim(thisform.txtfolder2.value), 1, '\')
_findfilesinfoldertree(m.folder1)
select 'foundfiles'
scan for foundfiles.filefolder = .f.
m.filename = ltrim(strextract(foundfiles.filename, m.folder1, '', 1, 1), 1, '\')
append blank in 'sql_log'
if '\' $ m.filename
replace sql_log.guid with '1' + m.filename in 'sql_log'
else
replace sql_log.guid with '2' + m.filename in 'sql_log'
endif
replace sql_log.filename1 with m.filename in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.hash1 with mr_fingerprint(foundfiles.filename) in 'sql_log'
endscan
_findfilesinfoldertree(m.folder2)
select 'foundfiles'
scan for foundfiles.filefolder = .f.
m.filename = ltrim(strextract(foundfiles.filename, m.folder2, '', 1, 1), 1, '\')
if seek(m.filename, 'sql_log', 'filename1') = .f.
append blank in 'sql_log'
if '\' $ m.filename
replace sql_log.guid with '1' + m.filename in 'sql_log'
else
replace sql_log.guid with '2' + m.filename in 'sql_log'
endif
endif
replace sql_log.filename2 with m.filename in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.hash2 with mr_fingerprint(foundfiles.filename) in 'sql_log'
endscan
select 'sql_log'
m.passnum = 1
scan
replace sql_log.passnum with m.passnum
m.passnum = m.passnum + 1
if sql_log.hash1 = 0
replace sql_log.levent with 'NEW'
loop
endif
if sql_log.hash2 = 0
replace sql_log.levent with 'DELETED'
loop
endif
if sql_log.hash1 # sql_log.hash2
replace sql_log.levent with 'CHANGED'
loop
endif
endscan
_logwrite('PROCESS END')
go top in 'sql_log'
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_scanfile *!* mr_scanfile
lparameters pfilename, pjson, phash, ppass
Local modid, modname, ojson
if not empty(m.pjson)
m.ojson = nfjsonread(m.pjson)
m.modid = m.ojson.id m.modname = m.ojson.name
else
m.modid = 'ERROR' + sys(2015) m.modname = m.pfilename
endif
if m.ppass = 1
append blank in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.filename1 with m.pfilename in 'sql_log' replace sql_log.hash1 with m.phash in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.filename2 with '' in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.modid with m.modid in 'sql_log' replace sql_log.modname with m.modname in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.levent with 'REMOVED' in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.passnum with m.ppass in 'sql_log'
else
if seek(m.modid, 'sql_log', 'modid') = .t. and sql_log.passnum = 1
replace sql_log.filename2 with m.pfilename in 'sql_log' replace sql_log.hash2 with m.phash in 'sql_log'
if sql_log.hash1 == sql_log.hash2
replace sql_log.levent with '' in 'sql_log'
if justext(sql_log.filename1) = 'disabled' and justext(sql_log.filename2) = 'jar'
replace sql_log.levent with 'ENABLED' in 'sql_log'
endif
if justext(sql_log.filename1) = 'jar' and justext(sql_log.filename2) = 'disabled'
replace sql_log.levent with 'DISABLED' in 'sql_log'
endif
else
replace sql_log.levent with 'UPDATED' in 'sql_log'
if justext(sql_log.filename1) = 'disabled' and justext(sql_log.filename2) = 'jar'
replace sql_log.levent with sql_log.levent + '/ENABLED' in 'sql_log'
endif
if justext(sql_log.filename1) = 'jar' and justext(sql_log.filename2) = 'disabled'
replace sql_log.levent with sql_log.levent + '/DISABLED' in 'sql_log'
endif
endif
else
append blank in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.filename2 with m.pfilename in 'sql_log' replace sql_log.hash2 with m.phash in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.modid with m.modid in 'sql_log' replace sql_log.modname with m.modname in 'sql_log'
replace sql_log.levent with 'NEW' in 'sql_log'
endif
replace sql_log.passnum with m.ppass in 'sql_log'
endif
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_scanfolder *!* mr_scanfolder
lparameters pfolder, ppass
local afiles[1], filename, filespec, fileunc, lnx, ncount
if not empty(m.pfolder) and directory(m.pfolder)
m.filespec = addbs(m.pfolder) + '*.*'
m.ncount = adir(afiles, m.filespec, '', 1)
for m.lnx = 1 to m.ncount
m.filename = m.afiles(m.lnx, 1)
if not inlist(upper(justext(m.filename)), 'JAR', 'DISABLED')
loop
endif
m.fileunc = addbs(m.pfolder) + m.filename
_logwrite(justfname(m.fileunc))
thisform.mr_scanfile(m.filename, mr_getfilefromzipfile(m.fileunc, 'fabric.mod.json'), mr_fingerprint(m.fileunc), m.ppass)
endfor
endif
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_setfolder *!* mr_setfolder
lparameters pfoldernum
Local cfolder, getdircaption, selfolder
if m.pfoldernum = 1
m.cfolder = thisform.txtfolder1.value
m.getdircaption = 'Select folder 1'
else
m.cfolder = thisform.txtfolder2.value
m.getdircaption = 'Select folder 1'
if empty(m.cfolder) and not empty(thisform.txtfolder1.value)
m.cfolder = thisform.txtfolder1.value
endif
endif
if empty(m.cfolder)
m.cfolder = set('Default')
endif
m.selfolder = getdir(m.cfolder, m.getdircaption, '', 1 + 64 + 16 + 32)
if not empty(m.selfolder) then
if m.pfoldernum = 1
_inisetvalue('COMPARECONFIG_FOLDER1', m.selfolder)
thisform.txtfolder1.value = m.selfolder
else
_inisetvalue('COMPARECONFIG_FOLDER2', m.selfolder)
thisform.txtfolder2.value = m.selfolder
endif
endif
ENDPROC PROCEDURE updateui
if sql_log.hash1 = 0
thisform.tbeditl.enabled = .f.
else
thisform.tbeditl.enabled = .t.
endif
if sql_log.hash2 = 0
thisform.tbeditr.enabled = .f.
else
thisform.tbeditr.enabled = .t.
endif
if sql_log.hash1 = sql_log.hash2 or sql_log.hash1 = 0 or sql_log.hash2 = 0
thisform.tbwinmerge.enabled = .f.
else
thisform.tbwinmerge.enabled = .t.
endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: FontName = "Consolas" FontSize = 8 Anchor = 14 Height = 144 Left = 12 ReadOnly = .T. TabIndex = 9 Top = 348 Width = 936 ZOrderSet = 0 Value = IntegralHeight = .F. islog = .T. Name = "edtlog"
Height = 228 Left = 12 Top = 108 Width = 936 _gridcontextmenulang = en Name = "gridmain"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE AfterRowColChange lparameters nColIndex
this.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE DblClick thisform.mr_compare() ENDPROC PROCEDURE getdynamicbackcolor lparameters poColum as column
*!* http://materialuicolors.co/?utm_source=launchers
local lnDynamicBackColor
do case
case not empty(sql_log.levent)
m.lnDynamicBackColor = rgb(0xFF, 0xF9, 0xC4)
*!* Case mr_mods.fid1 = 0
*!* m.lnDynamicBackColor = Rgb(0xFF, 0xCD, 0xD2)
otherwise
m.lnDynamicBackColor = this.ColumnBackColor
endcase
return m.lnDynamicBackColor
ENDPROC PROCEDURE sethighlightbackcolor
*!* SET COLOR OF HIGHLIGHTED ROW IN GRID
Do Case
Case not empty(sql_log.levent)
This.HighlightBackColor = Rgb(255, 241, 118)
Otherwise
This.HighlightBackColor = This.gethighlightbackcolor()
Endcase
ENDPROC

record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click if not empty(sql_log.filename1)
mr_shellexecute('"' + addbs(thisform.txtfolder1.value) + sql_log.filename1 + '"')
endif ENDPROC

record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click if not empty(sql_log.filename2)
mr_shellexecute('"' + addbs(thisform.txtfolder2.value) + sql_log.filename2 + '"')
endif ENDPROC
